entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: The main antagonist, also known as Voldemort. He is mentioned as a powerful and dangerous entity who has Death Eaters patrolling the skies.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: A government-like institution that governs the wizarding world. They are mentioned as being deceived by a fake trail left by Harry's protectors.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who serve You-Know-Who. They are mentioned as patrolling the skies in this general area.

entities.name: kingsley's place
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt's home, which is one of several houses that have been given protection by Harry's protectors.

entities.name: molly auntie muriel's
entities.description: Molly Weasley's aunt Muriel's home, which is one of several houses that have been given protection by Harry's protectors.

entities.name: tonks's parents
entities.description: The home of Nymphadora Tonks's parents, where Harry will be hiding once he is within the boundaries of the protective enchantments.

relationships.description: You-Know-Who has Death Eaters patrolling the skies in this general area.
The Ministry is being deceived by a fake trail left by Harry's protectors, which they think will make You-Know-Who believe that Harry is not leaving until the thirtieth.
Kingsley's home has been given protection by Harry's protectors, which will prevent You-Know-Who from finding Harry there.
Molly Weasley's aunt Muriel's home has been given protection by Harry's protectors, which will prevent You-Know-Who from finding Harry there.
Tonks's parents' home has been given protection by Harry's protectors, which will prevent You-Know-Who from finding Harry there.
